name: Major Feature Release
body:
## Highlights

- MinIO server runs in high performance mode by turning off content-md5 sum calculation by default. See #7609 for more details. To run MinIO server in strict S3 compatibility mode, please start server with --compat flag.
- Major performance improvements in listing. See (#7611) for more details.
- Major performance improvements in bulk object deletes. See (#7607 and #7644) for more details.


## Changelog

- Add connection close proactively for Walk() http/rpc (#7645) (05/14/19)
- xl: Avoid possible race during bulk Multi Delete (#7644) (05/14/19)
- Offload listing to posix layer (#7611) (05/14/19)
- Simplify putObject by not breaking the stream into parts (#7199) (05/14/19)
- Implement bulk delete (#7607) (05/13/19)
- Remove duplicate checkPutObjectArgs in PutObject and (#7396) (05/13/19)
- Accept simpler response from OPA (#7637) (05/12/19)
- Sync before Close() to avoid random I/O (#7638) (05/11/19)
- Add API retry functionality in mc admin (#7602) (05/09/19)
- Turn off md5sum optionally if content-md5 is not set (#7609) (05/08/19)
- Separate issue templates for bug report and feature requests (#7616) (05/07/19)
- Deadcode removal (#7627) (05/07/19)
- On macOS avoid using GNU specific options (#7621) (05/07/19)
- Fix: Handle regression caused by gorilla mux v1.7.0 (#7625) (05/07/19)
- Fix listing empty directory in recursive mode (#7613) (05/06/19)
- Delete checked in binary file (#7615) (05/03/19)
- Support IPv6 hosts for postgres connections (#7168) (05/03/19)

name: Minor Bug Fix Release
body:
## Highlights

- Use etcd watch API to asynchronously load users. See (#7551) for more details.
- Use O_DIRECT while writing objects to disk to help with reliability and performance. See (#7479) for more details.
- Disable inter node deadlines to support slow clients. See (#7590) for more details.
- Fix regression caused by breaking change introduced in gorilla mux API in virtual style host requests. See (#7595) for more details. 
- Compression related bug fixes. See (#7600 and #7584) for more details.

## Changelog

- Compression: Handle auto encryption when size is unknown (#7600) (05/02/19)
- gcs: check error on object writer close (#7606) (05/02/19)
- Show SlowDown error message if backend is busy (#7521) (05/02/19)
- Remove delayIsLeaf requirement simplify ListObjects further (#7593) (05/02/19)
- Remove logs from bitrot-streaming.go as erasure layer is already logging (#7603) (05/01/19)
- Clarify server maximums via Federation (#7608) (05/01/19)
- Fix hdfsReader fd leak upon GetObject() (#7596) (05/01/19)
- Posix CreateFile should work for compressed lengths (#7584) (04/30/19)
- Change order of trace source in error log (#7599) (04/29/19)
- Minor TLS documentation improvements (#7592) (04/29/19)
- Fix: Handle regression caused by gorilla mux v1.7.0 (#7595) (04/29/19)
- Complain if we detect sub-optimal ordering in distributed setup (#7576) (04/29/19)
- Remove timeout conn on net.Dialer (#7590) (04/27/19)
- Fix divide by 0 error when directio.AlignSize is 0 (#7591) (04/26/19)
- Use etcd watch to reload IAM users (#7551) (04/26/19)
- xl: Use random UUID during complete multipart upload (#7527) (04/25/19)
- Deprecate updating admin credentials using API calls (#7570) (04/24/19)

name: Major Bug Fix Release
body:
## Highlights
- Two critical security issues related to privilege escalation are fixed in #7474 & #7476.  **Upgrade immediately**, if you do user management with MinIO's in-built user management system or with an external Identity Provider. MinIO Gateway deployments are not affected. See [here](https://blog.minio.io/minio-release-2019-04-04t18-31-46z-security-advisory-6dcad1a115b8) for specifc details.
- Miscellaneous bug fix improvements in the areas of S3 Select, Policy nesting and various other areas.

## Changelog

- Add check for extra input field (#7437) (04/02/19) <Ashish Kumar Sinha>

- Fix markdown table formatting (#7435) (03/27/19) <Harshavardhana>

name: Major Feature Release
body:
## Highlights
- Adds double encryption feature that allows S3 gateway to encrypt objects before sending to the backend (which may also independently encrypt objects).
- Add Parquet format support for S3 Select API.

## Changelog

name: Minor bug fix release
body:

- Add support for hostname lookups in MINIO_PUBLIC_IPS under federation deployments.
- Fixes bugs in policy validation, S3 compatibility issue in ListObjects etc.
- Docker edge builds are now multi-staged to reduce the overall size of the image.

name: Major Feature Release
body:
## Highlights
* Minio Server now supports the notion of users with attached policies. More details [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-multi-user-quickstart-guide.html) and [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-admin-complete-guide.html#users).
* Minio Server can be configured with external Identity Providers such as Keycloak, WSO2, Okta, Ping Identity to manage users. OPA may be used to manage policies. More details [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-sts-quickstart-guide.html).
* Minio Server now supports rotating credentials. Minio in the gateway mode works with etcd to support rotating credentials. More details [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-sts-quickstart-guide.html).
* Miscellaneous bug fixes in the areas of encryption, quorum, and s3 select.

name: Major Feature Release
body:
## Highlights
* Minio server allows streaming compression to ensure efficient disk space usage. Compression happens inflight, i.e objects are compressed before being written to disk(s). For more details, see [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-compression-guide.html).
* Major performance & memory usage improvements. For more details, see [here](https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/6464).
* Regression fix in bitrot read  functionality.
* Regression fix in PutObject functionality in Minio Server and Gateway.
* Major bugfixes in the healing, worm mode, idle clients, range requests and multipart upload.

## Changelog
* xl: Fix typo in PutObject when uploading a 10Mb file (#6567) (10/04/18) <Anis Elleuch>

name: Major bug fix release
body: ## Highlights - Bugfixes to GetObject and CopyObject APIs to avoid race conditions when concurrent object operations are performed. - Breaking Change: Config entries for Domain and Browser are no longer supported in config.json. Details [here](https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/6498). - Community Contribution (from @jaym) : Allow s3 gateway honor different AWS auth mechanisms. Details [here](https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/6422). - Miscellaneous improvements to performance, error handling, retry mechanisms, s3select, profiling, healing and browser. ## Changelog - Use GetObjectNInfo in CopyObject and CopyObjectPart (#6489) (09/25/18) - Return HTTP response error for malformed requests (#6517) (09/25/18) - Quickly build dev docker images using 'make docker' (#6505) (09/25/18) - add functions to remove confidential information (#6516) (09/24/18) - HEAD on an object should mimic GET without body (#6508) (09/23/18) - Remove unnecessary contexts passed as data to FatalIf. No need to log an empty context. (#6487) (09/22/18) - Switch back to GetObjectInfo for HEAD requests (#6513) (09/21/18) - Update GCS storage library to support GetObject API on gzipped objects (#6506) (09/21/18) - Fix cleanup of pipe in GetObjectNInfo handlers (#6509) (09/21/18) - Add GetObjectNInfo to object layer (#6449) (09/20/18) - Deprecate domain, browser as config entries (#6498) (09/20/18) - fix success alert not shown after object is uploaded (#6500) (09/20/18) - select API CSV may not be specified (#6493) (09/20/18) - Avoid changing creds in streaming signature (#6495) (09/19/18) - Peer/rpc should never honor RPC calls without object-layer (#6486) (09/19/18) - Allow minio s3 gateway to use different AWS auth mechanisms (#6422) (09/19/18) - Add Profiler Admin API (#6463) (09/19/18) - Prioritize HTTP requests over Heal (#6468) (09/17/18) - Remove brittle TestServerTLSCiphers unit test (#5982) (09/17/18) - Send progress only when requested by client in SelectObject (#6467) (09/16/18) - Use retry mechanism when initializing configuration (#6475) (09/16/18) - Add 'disk' tag to log output to enhance 'disk not found' errors (#6460) (09/13/18) - fix: UploadPart,CopyObjectPart does not need sse-s3 header (#6386) (09/13/18) - fix public directory listing not working in browser (#6466) (09/14/18) - Combine obtaining resource, host, method into one operation (#6465) (09/13/18)

name: Major bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
* Bugfixes to improve in the areas of memory and performance.
* **Breaking Change:** config.json will be renamed to config.json.deprecated. Entries in config.json.deprecated will be continued to be honored until this PR is merged. Config changes documentation is available [here](https://github.com/minio/minio/blob/master/docs/config/README.md).
* **Breaking Change:** Distributed Minio Server nodes require access and secret key as environment variables. Additonally if a domain needs to be set, MINIO_DOMAIN env variable needs to be set explicitly. Config.json entries will be deprecated next release. See [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/distributed-minio-quickstart-guide.html) for more details.
* Better log messages, documentation fixes and other miscellaneous fixes.

## Changelog 
* Ignore migration if config files don't exist (#6448) (09/10/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Print storage errors during distributed initialization (#6441) (09/11/18) <Anis Elleuch>
* Rename config.json in config-dir with '.deprecated' extension (#6446) (09/10/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Add ObjectOptions to ObjectLayer calls (#6382) (09/10/18) <poornas>
* s3select should honour custom record delimiter (#6419) (09/10/18) <Praveen raj Mani>
* Reword missing credentials error msg (#6418) (09/09/18) <Anis Elleuch>
* Allow backward compatible way to load creds from config.json (#6435) (09/07/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Redis documentation Fix (#6378) (09/07/18) <Praveen raj Mani>
* Show pointer when user hovers over folder name (#6412) (09/07/18) <Kaan Kabalak>
* Kafka (sarama) authentication with user/pass (#6291) (09/07/18) <Annanay Agarwal>
* Fix Manta gateway client creation flow (#6425) (09/07/18) <Nitish Tiwari>
* Remove "List Object Parts" from Azure limitations (#6427) (09/07/18) <Janko Marohni>
* Gateway should honour --address flag while checking port availability (#6428) (09/07/18) <Krishnan Parthasarathi>
* return Access Denied for invalid SSE keys (#6432) (09/06/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
* postgresql: Disable validation of connectionString field (#6397) (09/06/18) <Anis Elleuch>
* Add admin get/set config keys API (#6113) (09/06/18) <Anis Elleuch>
* Drain response body properly for http connection pool (#6415) (09/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
* xl: Fix removing an empty directory (#6421) (09/06/18) <Anis Elleuch>
* Bump up soMaxConn backlog for listener to 2048 (#6416) (09/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Fail for critical errors early on during prepare storage (#6404) (09/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Fix config subsystem to wait on quorum number of formatted disks (#6407) (09/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Send length instead of empty buffer for ReadFile() (#6414) (09/04/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
* Fix distributed docs to mention homogenous envs (#6405) (09/04/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Implement ListMultipartUploads, ListObjectParts for GCS gateway (#6377) (09/05/18) <Krishnan Parthasarathi>

* Remove double backtick that was breaking docs (#6410) (09/04/18) <Barnaby Keene>

name: Minor bug fix release
body:

* Fix docker health check to show "healthy" status.
* Fix Deleteobject to handle empty directories deletion properly.
* Support TCP_FASTOPEN flag with graceful recovery.

name: Major Feature & Bugfix Release
body:
## Highlights
- Minio Server supports SQL Select API with CSV objects. See documentation [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-select-api-quickstart-guide.html).
- Minio Server supports SSE-S3 encryption with HashiCorp's Vault. See documentation [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-kms-quickstart-guide.html).
- Various fixes available in the areas of garbage collection, memory/lock management, simplification of erasure code, error logging, documentation and regressions in bucket policy and listings.

## Changelog
- Ensure that setConfig uses latest functionality (#6302) (08/17/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Use new listener which implements enhanced tcp features (#6289) (08/17/18) <Harshavardhana>

- Correct link paths in Chinese documentation (#6299) (08/17/18) <Kaan Kabalak>
- Add support for SSE-S3 server side encryption with vault (#6192) (08/17/18) <poornas>
- Modify several translation errors  (#6038) (08/17/18) <junpeng liu>
- Allow for proper garbage collection pooling bytes.Buffer (#6266) (08/16/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Watch for symlinked certs in container envs (#6282) (08/16/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Make sure to update modTime in erasure metadata (#6296) (08/16/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Validate prefixes on all sets (#6294) (08/16/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Remove unnecessary error log messages (#6186) (08/16/18) <kannappanr>
- Remove select docs (#6287) (08/15/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Support supplying custom drives per set count (#6261) (08/15/18) <Harshavardhana>
- S3 Select API Support for CSV (#6127) (08/15/18) <Arjun Mishra>
- Migrate config.json from config-dir to backend (#6195) (08/14/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Unlock read lock on uploadID upon errors (#6283) (08/14/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Log disk not found error just once (#6059) (08/14/18) <kannappanr>
- gcs: Translate S3 user-defined metadata prefix to/from GCS custom metadata prefix (#6270) (08/15/18) <wd256>
- Implement memory efficient readdir for windows (#6247) (08/09/18) <Harshavardhana>
- crypto: add SSE-KMS HTTP header detection (#6228) (08/09/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Fix bug in Share Object Modal (#6257) (08/09/18) <Sanat Mouli>
- Add s390x support (#6263) (08/09/18) <Durgadas Kamath>
- Avoid sending an error after 206 HTTP code (#6264) (08/08/18) <Anis Elleuch>

- Use sha256-simd instead of crypto/sha256 (#6252) (08/06/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Simplify erasure code by separating bitrot from erasure code (#5959) (08/06/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- simplifying if-else chains to switches (#6208) (08/06/18) <Oleg Kovalov>
- Support dumb terminals by turning off color (#6246) (08/06/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Add reliable RemoveAll to handle racy situations (#6227) (08/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Hold locks granularly in nslockMap (#6242) (08/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Add granular locking in retryTicker (#6236) (08/03/18) <Harshavardhana>
- catch crypto.* errors and add SSE-S3 invalid algorithm err (#6229) (08/04/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Increase max idle connections from 100 to 4096 (#6244) (08/03/18) <Harshavardhana>
- nas gateway: fix regression in global bucket policy initialization (#6243) (08/03/18) <poornas>

name: Major bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
* Regression fixed in updating NAS Gateway Bucket Policy from disk.
* Return correct error code 503 instead of 404 for GetObject when more than half the disks are not found.
* Deprecated ListLocks and ClearLocks.
* Miscellaneous other improvements and bug fixes.

## Changelog
* Deprecate ListLocks and ClearLocks (#6233) (08/02/18) <Harshavardhana>

* crypto: implement Stringer for S3 and SSEC (#6216) (07/31/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>

* Fix healthcheck handler to verify gateway backend liveness (#6218) (07/31/18) <Nitish Tiwari>
* Return 503 instead of 404 if more than half of disks are not found (#6207) (07/31/18) <kannappanr>

name: Security Fix Release
body:
## Highlights
If you are running RELEASE.2018-06-29T02-11-29Z or older and actively use SSE-C encryption of objects, please upgrade immediately. This release fixes ``object rebinding SSE-C security guarantee violation``. Please refer https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/6121 for more details. 

## Changelog
- Support 1GB disk size (#6137) (07/09/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- fix object rebinding SSE-C security guarantee violation (#6121) (07/10/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>

- Update comments regarding GCS component count (#6131) (07/06/18) <Mike Scarlett>

- completed sample config and fix wrong json format (#6096) (07/05/18) <wksw>
- cache: allow ellipse style entries for MINIO_CACHE_DRIVES (#6088) (07/03/18) <poornas>

- Validate Minio config.json file on the client side (#6067) (07/03/18) <ebozduman>
- Do not log BucketNotFound errors on minio console (#6114) (07/03/18) <kannappanr>
- Add support for ppc64le (#6116) (07/03/18) <Rafael Peria de Sene>

name: Major Bugfix Release
body:
## Highlights
- Swapped out Go RPC based implementation in Minio Server with HTTP Post based RPC. This change fixes multiple hangs, slowness issues in Minio Server. See #5840.
- Added Prometheus metrics support for Minio Gateway. This is a community contribution from Yaroslav Skopets @yskopets. See #5987
- Minio auto loads ssl certs when they are updated. See #5963.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

## Changelog
- Fix regression issue where users couldn't click into folders (#6029) (06/07/18) <Kaan Kabalak>
- NewUX: On filename click, select file instead of downloading (#6023) (06/07/18) <Kaan Kabalak>
- Add request tracing support for other REST APIs (#6013) (06/07/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Ignore region in the case of admin API (#5919) (06/07/18) <Praveen raj Mani>
- remove separate file for posix utils. (#5948) (06/07/18) <Bala FA>
- Persist MINIO_WORM as part of config.json (#6022) (06/06/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Refresh in-memory bucket policy cache every 5 minutes (#6007) (06/06/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Implement HTTP POST based RPC (#5840) (06/06/18) <Bala FA>
- Relax runtime requirement do not fail, print warning (#6017) (06/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Deprecate and remove configurable disk usage check (#6016) (06/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Fix presigned URL for access key with special characters (#6012) (06/05/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Allow usage check to be configurable (#6006) (06/04/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Fix byte pool usage, use only one pool for all sets. (#5990) (06/01/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Bring nicer ui error if creds are missing in Gateway (#6003) (06/01/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Add user-agent for azure blob requests (#6002) (06/01/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Fix s3cmd issue with ACL handling (#5999) (05/31/18) <Harshavardhana>
- terminate disk-usage routine in tests (#5998) (05/31/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Implement auto cert reloading (#5963) (05/31/18) <Harshavardhana>
- fix admin info peer to point to first endpoint (#5996) (05/30/18) <Harshavardhana>
- ensure authenticated request bodies for Admin-API (#5984) (05/30/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Add prometheus endpoint to support total Used storageInfo (#5988) (05/30/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Remove quotes for XSS Protection Header (#5992) (05/30/18) <Arjun Mishra>
- Add Prometheus metrics for Minio gateway (#5987) (05/30/18) <Yaroslav Skopets>
- updated pika API changes in rabbitMQ notification doc (#5980) (05/26/18) <Praveen raj Mani>

name: Major bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
* Revamped the disk usage calculation per tenant to be accurate and updated every 12 hours.
* Security bug fix to close potential DoS vulnerability. See #5957 below.

## Changelog
* Update Kubernetes TLS doc with info for distributed setups (#5971) (05/24/18) <Nitish Tiwari>
* Deprecate showing drive capacity and total free (#5976) (05/23/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Implement support for calculating disk usage per tenant (#5969) (05/23/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Fix typo (#5960) (05/22/18) <Acid Chicken ()>
* Fix tabs/indents in help message (#5962) (05/21/18) <Harshavardhana>
* Support endpoints through env (#5952) (05/18/18) <Harshavardhana>
* security: fix write-to-RAM DoS vulnerability (#5957) (05/18/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
* handle Kubernetes read-only secrets (#5951) (05/18/18) <rawipfel>
* Remove treewalk abort log message (#5953) (05/17/18) <kannappanr>
* rename checkPathValid() to getValidPath() (#5949) (05/17/18) <Bala FA>

 -  Fixed a regression where remote bucket policies were not updated. Please refer to #5941.

name: Major Bugfix Release
body:
## Highlights
- Crash that occurs when healing minio server is now fixed. This is a regression in RELEASE.2018-05-10T00-00-42Z. Upgrading to this release (RELEASE.2018-05-11T00-29-24Z)  will fix this issue.
- Implemented dummy GetBucketACL APIs to support legacy applications.

## Changelog
- fix: introduce isLeafDir in healing to fix the crash (#5920) (05/10/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Implement a dummy GetBucketACL for legacy reasons (#5906) (05/09/18) <Harshavardhana>

name: Major feature release
body:
## Highlights
- Minio server metrics can be collected using Prometheus. Please refer to our [documentation](https://docs.minio.io/docs/how-to-monitor-minio-using-prometheus).
- Critical improvements to error messages logged by Minio. 
- Support for empty directories for legacy applications.
- Important fixes to prevent crashes. Refer #5898
- Important regression issue fix. Refer #5889 

## Changelog
- Log errors only once for event notification errors (#5905) (05/09/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- fix: Avoid more crashes due to concurrent map usage (#5912) (05/09/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Return detailed msg for notification errors (#5913) (05/09/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- More fixes for error messages (#5911) (05/09/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- fix: Avoid concurrent map writes in go-routines (#5898) (05/09/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Fix typo in prometheus scrape url (#5909) (05/09/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- Remove trailing/leading spaces in Certificates (#5885) (05/09/18) <Praveen raj Mani>
- Enhancements in Minio Prometheus exporter (#5848) (05/09/18) <Ashish Kumar Sinha>
- Fix unnecessary log messages to avoid flooding the logs (#5900) (05/08/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Fix azure list-objects not to list minio.sys.tmp/ (#5895) (05/08/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Better support of empty directories (#5890) (05/08/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- Enhance fatal errors printing of common issues seen by users (#5878) (05/08/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- Add new S3 APIs which are not implemented (#5899) (05/08/18) <Harshavardhana>
- fs: fix a regression allow reading of existing files (#5889) (05/07/18) <Harshavardhana>

name: Critical Security Fix Release
body:
## Highlights 
 - If you are running RELEASE.20180427T233352Z, please upgrade immediately. This release fixes a Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability against the Minio Server. Please refer to our [blog](https://blog.minio.io/minio-release-may-5-2018-security-advisory-ceca2850d40)  for more details.

## Changelog
- fix DoS vulnerability in request authentication (#5887) (05/04/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Use defer style to stop tickers to avoid current/possible misuse (#5883) (05/04/18) <Anis Elleuch>
- Do not use crypto.SHA3_256 as placeholder for HighwayHash256 (#5847) (05/04/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- fs: fix logging by not logging common scenarios (#5882) (05/02/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Return NoSuchKey for anonReqs with s3:ListBucket policy (#5876) (05/01/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Remove s3:ListObjects policy action to be in sync with AWS-S3 (#5875) (05/01/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Copy an object without user-defined metadata for Azure gateway (#5872) (05/02/18) <wd256>
- vendor x/sys/cpu and update x/crypto/blake2b (#5870) (05/01/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Heal only when atleast one of the disk is unformatted (#5866) (04/30/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Increased MaxIdleConnsPerHost to prevent excessive re-connections and TIME_WAIT when more than 100 clients are using minio (#5860) (04/30/18) <cbenien>
- Fix output of AMQP example (#5867) (04/30/18) <Egor Panfilov>

name: Major bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
- Remove logging of redundant messages when running Minio server.
- Upgrading to this release will automatically migrate any erroneous bucket policies to strict S3 compliant bucket policies. Please check all your bucket policies after upgrading to this release.

## Changelog
- Support for ListObjectsV1 style marker for Azure gateway (#5856) (04/27/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Disable logging during unit tests (#5861) (04/27/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Support migrating inconsistent bucket policies (#5855) (04/27/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Add example on how to deploy minio without a backing store. (#5810) (04/27/18) <Elson Rodriguez>
- Fix error checks when cache is offline/missing. (#5850) (04/25/18) <poornas>
- Continue healing other objects even if objects without quorum exist (#5851) (04/25/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Do not log errFileNotFound error (#5853) (04/25/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Regenerate fs.json if it is corrupted in FS mode (#5778) (04/24/18) <kannappanr>
- Enhance policy handling to support SSE and WORM (#5790) (04/25/18) <Bala FA>
- Disable elliptic curves P-384 and P-521 for TLS. (#5845) (04/25/18) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Change MAINTAINER to LABEL (#5843) (04/24/18) <Benjamin>
- Fix s3 compatibility fixes for getBucketLocation,headBucket,deleteBucket (#5842) (04/23/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Cleanup and make a safer code (#5794) (04/21/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Use package name correctly (#5827) (04/22/18) <Bala FA>
- Remove panic() and handle it appropriately (#5807) (04/19/18) <ebozduman>
- Disable "chunked" uploading by the GCS client for objects smaller than the chunk size. (#5835) (04/20/18) <wd256>

name: Major feature release
body:
## Highlights
- **Breaking Change**: If you installed previous release **RELEASE.2018-03-28T23-45-53Z**, please delete your old cache and start afresh. For more details on this breaking change please see https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/5732
- Please follow [Disk Cache Guide](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-disk-cache-guide) to get started.
- System level support to run minio server in WORM mode. See minio server -h for more details.
- Fixed a regression in bucket notifications #5673 #5734 

## Changelog
- Fix backend format for disk-cache - not to use FS format.json (#5732) (03/29/18) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Fix help message to be uniform across env vars (#5735) (03/30/18) <Nitish Tiwari>
- Apply storageClass data while config migration (#5737) (03/30/18) <Nitish Tiwari>
- Fix PUT bucket notification deadlocks (#5734) (03/29/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Fix block id length upto 8bytes only for azure gateway. (#5731) (03/29/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Improve some wording in disk caching docs (#5730) (03/28/18) <Harshavardhana>
- Remove deadcode related to multipart cleanup for fs (#5716) (03/28/18) <poornas>

name: Major feature release
body:
## Highlights
- Minio server now supports disk caching. Disk caching is available for both GET and PUT operations. To get started, see documentation [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-disk-cache-guide).
- Limited support to run minio server in WORM mode. See `minio server -h` for more details.
- Fixed a regression in removing bucket notifications  [#5673](https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/5673).

## Changelog
- Add disk-cache and worm to user-agent (#5729) (03/28/18) <poornas>

- Use uuid.New() for uploadID in azure gateway (#5721) (03/28/18) <Harshavardhana>

name: Critical bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
- This release fixes a critical migration issue when upgrading minio between certain versions. Please see issue for more details as described by community member (@kybi) here :  https://github.com/minio/minio/issues/5667. 
- We recommend updating Minio immediately with this latest release.

## Changelog
- [refactor] simplify en/decrypted size computation (#5658) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Fix format migration regression (#5668) <Harshavardhana>

name: Bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
- Flat & lock free multipart support for erasure backend is now available.
- Fixes a regression in Heal() implementation due to lock contention.
- Major cleanup of **notification** sub-system.

## Changelog
- Fix heal bucket deadlock after replacing disks (#5661) <Harshavardhana>
- Return InvalidDigest when md5 sent by client is invalid (#5654) <Harshavardhana>
- Use context.Background() instead of nil Rename Context[Get|Set] -> [Get|Set]Context <Krishna Srinivas>
- Adds context support for nas, oss and s3 <Ersan>
- Add context support for gateway b2, manta, gcs <kannappanr>
- Add context to the object-interface methods. Make necessary changes to xl fs azure sia <Krishna Srinivas>
- Flat multipart backend implementation for Erasure backend (#5447) <Krishna Srinivas>
- make notification as separate package (#5294) <Bala FA>
- Update healthcheck related examples and add head support (#5650) <Nitish Tiwari>
- Cleanup large bucket support documents (#5641) <Nitish Tiwari>
- Update minio-go dependencies to latest 5.0.0 release (#5640) <Harshavardhana>
- Support content-language header (#5648) <Harshavardhana>
- Updated healthcheck file (#5647) <tparker00>
- Update volume in Dockerfiles (#5646) <Nitish Tiwari>
- fix spelling (#5643) <Yueh-Ting  Chen>
- Swap max_hw_sectors_kb for max_sectors_kb. Fixes #5633. (#5638) <Alexander Stuart-Kregor>

name: Major feature release
body:
## Highlights
- Added comprehensive support for **[Server Side Encryption (SSE-C)](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/ServerSideEncryptionCustomerKeys.html)**.
- Create **large buckets** with *more* than 16 disks on erasure coded Minio server backends. You can also provide *more* than 16 servers upto **32** on the command line, refer to our documentation [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-large-bucket-support-quickstart-guide) to get started. 
- Introducing **NAS** gateway mode, refer to our documentation [here](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-gateway-for-nas) to get started. 
 
## Changelog
- Add Minio TLS configuration doc for Kubernetes deployment (#5617) <Nitish Tiwari>
- Fix deadlock in in-place CopyObject decryption/encryption (#5637) <Harshavardhana>

name: Feature & bugfix release
body:
## Highlights
 - **Rolling Upgrade Support** to Minio Server.
- Breaking Changes: 
   - Users using Minio Client `mc` with Minio Server will have to upgrade to the latest `mc` [release](https://github.com/minio/mc/releases/tag/RELEASE.2018-02-09T23-07-36Z)
   - Admin API has changed please [refer](https://github.com/minio/minio/blob/master/pkg/madmin/API.md)
- Deprecated and removed in-memory **object caching**.
- Default bit-rot protection is now using [HighwayHash](https://github.com/minio/highwayhash)

## Changelog
- Move to go1.9.4 with recent security release (#5502) <Harshavardhana>
- Seek to offset 0 after Truncate() (#5375) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Bring semantic versioning to provide for rolling upgrades (#5495) <Harshavardhana>
- Document object name limitations on Windows (#5491) <kannappanr>
- Deprecate and remove in-memory object caching (#5481) <Harshavardhana>
- Make sure to convert the disk errors to object errors (#5480) <Harshavardhana>
- Reduce Minio access key minimum length to 3 (#5478) <A. Elleuch>
- Quorum based listing for XL (#5475) <Krishna Srinivas>
- fs.json file should be closed in CompleteMultipartUpload (#5482) <Krishna Srinivas>
- simplify storage class validation (#5470) <Harshavardhana>
- Remove stale code from minio server (#5479) <Harshavardhana>
- Lock free multipart backend implementation for FS (#5401) <Krishna Srinivas>
- Fix configuration handling bugs: (#5473) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Removes capitalization of error causes (#5468) <ebozduman>
- Support creating directories on erasure coded backend (#5443) <Harshavardhana>
- Autocorrect user provided Azure endpoint (#5417) <Krishna Srinivas>
- add documentation about PKCS-8 encrypted RSA keys (#5454) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Admin API auth and heal related fixes (#5445) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- fix testcases to init nslock properly (#5429) <poornas>
- Update dockerfile go version to 1.9.2 (#5441) <Harshavardhana>
- Fix locking in some admin APIs: (#5438) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Update madmin doc (fixes #5432) (#5433) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Move admin APIs to new path and add redesigned heal APIs (#5351) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Fix a bug in dsync initialization and communication (#5428) <Harshavardhana>
- Add notification structure link (#5426) <Harshavardhana>
- Remove requirement for custom RPCClient (#5405) <Harshavardhana>
- add HighwayHash256 support (#5359) <Andreas Auernhammer>
- Remove dead code and associated dead code warning (#5424) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Add license scan report and status (#5430) <fossabot>
- fix: listobjects return empty response for invalid prefix/marker (#5425) <poornas>
- Fix lock rpc server maintenance loop go-routine leak (#5423) <Harshavardhana>

body:

name: Feature and bug fix release
body:
# Highlights

- **Experimental and non-production use**: Gateway support for **Sia Storage**, **Alibaba Object Storage** and **Manta Object Storage** are added.
- **Chinese translation** of documentation added to the project.
- **Storage class** support is now available in erasure coded mode. Two classes of storage: *Standard* and *Reduced Redundancy* are now supported. [Learn more](https://github.com/minio/minio/blob/master/docs/erasure/storage-class/README.md)

name: Feature and bug fix release
body:
## Highlights
- Minio now supports [AWS S3 Compatible Server Side Encryption](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/ServerSideEncryptionCustomerKeys.html) using AES-256-GCM and ChaCha20-Poly1305.  [Learn more.]( https://docs.minio.io/docs/how-to-use-minio-s-server-side-encryption-with-aws-cli)
- Minio extends [AWS S3 Event Message Structure](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/notification-content-structure.html) to include user metadata in bucket event notifications for lambda compute usecases.
- Simplification of gateway backend registration (**Community Contribution**  from @timonwong)
- Minio now supports virtual host style URL access to buckets. [Learn more](https://docs.minio.io/docs/minio-server-configuration-guide)
-  Removed hardcoded Minio Browser prefix `/minio`, allowing reverse proxies to easily route requests.

## Changelog
- Improve make and make install messages (#5207) <Aditya Manthramurthy>

- Fix minio distributed setup to properly work on windows (#5152) <Harshavardhana>

- fix content-sha256 verification for presigned PUT (#5137) <Harshavardhana>
- Support conditions for ListMultipartUploads and ListParts (#5130) <Harshavardhana>
- Display help when access/secret key is not set (#5132) <kannappanr>
- Remove redirectHeaders method (#5120) <Nitish Tiwari>

- Remove unused value from retry-storage (#5129) <Harshavardhana>

- Allow event notifications to work without region (#5119) <Harshavardhana>
- browser: Return a more descriptive error for HTTP 500 (#5112) <Harshavardhana>
- Simplify gateway backend registration (#5111) <Timon Wong>
- Add space to error message (#5108) <Frank Wessels>

name: Major feature release
body:
### Highlights
- **Timeouts** are supported for **Locks**.
- **Offline** mode for remote disks to avoid constant retries in distributed mode.
- Optimize memory allocations, improving performance of erasure coding significantly.
- **HTTP** timeouts changed from 30secs to 15minutes.
- **Security** - Do not transfer accessKey/secretKey over network in remote disk RPC.
- **Azure Gateway** now supports uploading upto 5TiB objects. 

### Changelog
- azure: handle list objects properly (#4953) (3 days ago) <Bala FA>
- Add maxKeys validation for azure and gcs gateway (#4999) (3 days ago) <poornas>
- Fix CopyObject with metadata for Azure gateway (#4986) (3 days ago) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Add bucketName checks for azure and s3 gateway in GetBucketInfo. (#4992) (4 days ago) <Harshavardhana>
- Optimize healObject by eliminating extra data passes (#4949) (4 days ago) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Update Azure SDK (#4985) (4 days ago) <Aditya Manthramurthy>
- Vendorize latest minio-go (#4989) (4 days ago) <Nitish Tiwari>
- fs: optimize multipart clean work (#4944) (4 days ago) <fangyuxiang>
- tests: remove test cases not applicable for docker. (#4951) (5 days ago) <Bala FA>
- optimize memory allocs during reconstruct (#4964) (5 days ago) <Andreas Auernhammer>

name: Feature release GCS gateway and bug fixes.
body:
### Highlights

- Gateway now supports **GCS (Google Cloud Storage)** backend.
- Bucket Notifications are now supported for **MQTT** target.
- **Critical** bug fixes in HTTP and RPC request timeouts.

### NOTE 

- **GCS Gateway** support is in alpha state and not ready for **production** use.
- **Admin API** functionality continues to be in **experimental** state and is not ready for **production** use.

### Changelog

- api: Upon bucket delete remove in-memory state properly. (#4716) (17 hours ago) <Harshavardhana>

name: Bug fix and feature release.
body:
### Highlights
- Enable minio browser support for **Gateway** backends Azure and AWS S3. 
- Bypass network for lock requests for local server. (**dsync**) changes. 
- Safe locking semantics implemented under NAS backend mode. 

### NOTE
- **S3 Gateway** support continues to be in alpha state and not ready for **production** use.  
- **Admin API** functionality continues to be in experimental state and not ready for **production** use.

### Changelog
- Add steps to remove Minio volumes in the swarm (#4536) (20 hours ago) <Nitish Tiwari>

name: Bug fix and feature release.
body:
## Critical Fix
This release fixes a critical bug when deploying Minio in distributed mode using Kubernetes - [4225: Minio Server in RELEASE.2017-04-25T01-27-49Z and above, doesn't start in a distributed mode in Kubernetes]( https://github.com/minio/minio/issues/4225). All other Minio deployment scenarios do not encounter this issue.

## Breaking Change
If deploying minio in distibuted mode on kubernetes using a custom `yaml` file. Remove the `command` section, use the `args` section instead. See a [sample `yaml`](https://github.com/minio/minio/blob/master/docs/orchestration/kubernetes-yaml/minio-distributed-statefulset.yaml) file reference here.

## Highlights 

- **Azure Gateway**  now supports custom endpoint. 
- Adds **MySQL** as new bucket notification target.
- Performance improvements in dsync for high concurrent requests. 
- Relax TLS cipher suite requirements, minimum TLS protocol version is TLS 1.2.
- Bucket notifications are now supported for **GetObject** and **HeadObject** operations 
  as well, with extra source information. 

## NOTE
- **S3 Gateway** support is in alpha state and not ready for **production** use.  
- **Admin API** functionality is in experimental state and not ready for **production** use.

name: New feature release
body:
### Highlights

- First Stable Release of **Minio Gateway**.
- **Browser** now supports downloading multiple files.
- **Browser** now supports deleting multiple objects.
- **Browser** now fully supports generating share urls
  with custom expiry properly (previously release had
  a regression).
- Rewrite of graceful **HTTP** shutdown mechanism.
- Cleanups and many more bug fixes in object layer,
  rpc etc.

### ChangeLog

name: Bug fix release.
body:
### Highlights
- **CopyObjectPart** API implemented supporting recent docker registry release.
- **Browser** improvements handles large directories now with infinite scrolling.
- Minio server now can be built on **OpenBSD**, **NetBSD**, **Solaris/Illumos**.
- **Windows** now supports full case insensitive behavior.
- **PutObject** major optimization change for XL now splits parts properly.
- **Retry** go-routine control fix for server under high load.
- **Bitrot** now works properly on ARM. 
- **JWT** secretKey hash now cached.

### ChangeLog

name: Bug fix and new feature shared backend release
body:
### Highlights
- **Shared Backend** support - standalone server can be run on shared NAS backend.
- **CopyObject** API is not fully S3 compatible. 
- **ServerMux** now can handle idle connections.
- **Management APIs** are now available in _beta_.
- **Other** misc improvements in locking, re-connection logic etc.

name: Distributed bug fix release.
body:
- Fix a regression with logging.
- Fix a regression with Minio meta volume initialization.

name: Distributed Minio Release
body:
- Multi-disk support with **Erasure Code** and **Bit Rot** protection across **multiple nodes**.
- Browser improvements new features  **Bucket Policy**,  **Shareable URLs** and **Deleting Objects**.
- Bucket notification improvements with support for **NATS** and **Postgres**.
- Compatibility improvements with **Amazon S3 API**. 
- Major performance improvements across **Windows** platform.
- **Secure** SNI SSL certificate support with custom CAs.

name: Regression bug fix on OS X
Performance improvements and Signature V2 support
body:
- Block change to 1M from 128KiB and extensively use buffer pools.
- Sign V2 support.

name: Minor fix release
body:
- Change the update URL and deprecate usage of 'update=yes'
- Fix a signature issue.

name: Bug fix release.
body:
Highlights:
- FS/multipart: Append the parts to a file as and when the parts arrive. (#2513)
- server: http.Server do not add deadlines causes issues. (#2581)
- Signature-V4: Include content-length for signature calculation. (#2643)
- server/tls: allocate tls.Config{} properly. (#2537)

Other misc fixes.
- Return Owner information in ListObjectV2 only when fetch-owner is specified (#2654)
- server: Startup message now prints configured ARNs. (#2653)
- Add Request Not Ready error when presigned date request is not valid (#2646)
- Forbid requests generated at least 15 min in the past or in the future (#2648)
- S3-layer: Multiple-delete should return success for non-existent objects. (#2633)
- notifications: Fix bucket notifications for DeleteMultipleObjects. (#2609)
- bucket-handlers: fix missing return statement (#2553)

name: Bug fix release, fixes a regression in bucket policy handling.
Stable release bug fixes and new features.
body:
- **Listobjects** optimization, in terms of reducing number
  of Stat() calls.
- **SHA256** optimization to use processor extensions for
  signature v4 verification.
- Support for AWS S3 **Streaming Signature V4** support.
- Introduction of AWS S3 compatible **Bucket Notification** feature.
- Introduction of Bucket notification extension feature for **continuous replication** 
- **Graceful HTTP** server shutdown.

name: First Stable Release of Minio
body:
- **Amazon S3 API** compatible.
- Single disk support over a plain file system backend.
- Multi-disk support with **Erasure Code** and **Bit Rot** protection.
- Embedded **Object Browser** console using React framework.
- Built for **Cloud-Native** applications.

name: Modular architecture, Erasure code and Bitrot protection
body:
- Erasure coded backend with SHA512 based bit-rot protection.
- Full rewrite of server to be more modular.
- Support Amazon S3 ListObjects v2.

name: Major re-write release
body:
:cake: :cake: :cake: 

**Highlights**
- Multipart code re-written, with new backend format.
- List objects and multipart listing re-written faster listing based on syscall approach.
- Reset access and secret keys through Minio browser.
- Removal of minio-go dependency,  making SSL transparent.
- New operating system support FreeBSD amd64.
- Enhanced signature handling, better error messages.
- Bucket policy related fixes.
- More unittests :)

name: Minio server bug fix release
body:
- Fixes bug on windows during server initialization  :cake:
- Fixes bug on docker during server initialization  :cake:
- Bucket policy is now more stricter avoiding nested rules  :cake:
- ListObjects bug fix for 'max-keys=0' response  :cake:
- Print env access and secret keys after server initialization to be consistent  :cake:
- Other cleanups and minor perf improvements.  :cake:

This release has no changes related to WebUI.

name: Minio server release with new improvements.
body:
Browser improvements: :cake: 
- History based UI, remembers your previous URLs
- Transformations and reload animations 
- Asset size reduction from 4MB to 650KB
- Adding new icons for more file types 
- Notification improvements 

Server side: :cake: 
- Rewrite of ListObjects, major performance improvements and simple code base
- Implements new APIs - CopyObject (server side copy), Multiple Object Deletes (1000)
- Ports merged browser and server are both on port 9000 by default. 
- Docker registry support 
- Re-write of signature v4 and cleanups. 
- Use MINIO_ACCESS_KEY, MINIO_SECRET_KEY to override access and secret keys.
- Now GetObject and HeadObject both support more request headers.
  - If-Modified-Since, If-Unmodified-Since
  - If-Match, If-None-Match
- Implements support for basic Bucket Access Policy

name: Minio server release with minio browser
body:
This minio server release is an interim release 
- To get community feedback on the new minio browser.
- Code and performance improvements for multipart 
- Simple granular locking. 
- Clean cross platform support on windows paths. 
- And all other major fixes related to aws-sdk, s3cmd and aws cli compatibility.
